text: Bisanda Buzurg is a town and a nagar panchayat in Banda district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. Pin Code of Bisanda is 210203. Language of Bisanda is Bundeli, Hindi. ==Demographics== India census, Bisanda Buzurg city is divided into 11 wards for which elections are held every 5 years. The Bisanda Buzurg Nagar Panchayat has population of 11,611 of which 6,138 are males while 5,473 are females as per report released by Census India 2011. About 94% are Hindu and 6% Muslim. Buzurg is commonly called as BISANDA and the distance of Khajuraho from Bisanda is about 135 km, and Chitrakoot is about 64 km. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Banda district, India
title: Bisanda Buzurg
